OOC: Cloaks and Stealth mode give the optical illusion that something 
covered a object but light on the other hand pass to all things that are not 
solid giving all things shadows.

::Koj::

Koj flys low in stealth trying to remain in the shadows as Koj gets closer 
to the Ark he studies the surrounding. Koj sees shadows with no master 
figure to project them. "Optics change to battle grid targets shadows as 
targets compare to Trainners I have seen" as the computer lines up Prebon 
with a ground shadow. Gets on Complink: Maximals attack at Vector 001A. Koj 
gets a Target Lock and Fires 7 Freezing Ninja stars at Prebon. "Did you 
think you could be a member of the Dragon Clan at stealth." Koj spins the 
Fang in defensive stance.
